content: Head back along the bridge and through the balcony to the large doorway, and on the other side you can find a green Wisp to absorb hiding in the corner, and a small ramp leading to a large building at the top of several stone stairs.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
Head back along the bridge and through the balcony to the large doorway, and on the other side you can find a green Wisp to absorb hiding in the corner, and a small ramp leading to a large building at the top of several stone stairs.
